name: CLLocationSourceInformation
desc: Information about the source that provides a location.

items.name: init(softwareSimulationState: Bool, andExternalAccessoryState: Bool)
items.desc: Creates an instance of location source information.

items.name: var isProducedByAccessory: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system receives the location from an external accessory.

items.name: var isSimulatedBySoftware: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system generates the location using on-device software simulation.
